title: Azure DevOps
body: Using a mix of VNEXT and YAML pipelines to provide effective CI/CD solutions for a wide range of .Net applications.

title: .Net Stack
body: Knowledge of writing .Net Core & .Net Framework web applications whilst also having the need to debug VB.Net apps. Powershell is also used for automating various tasks such as environment builds.

title: SQL Server
body: Knowledge of provisioning SQL Server Instances, dealing with data refreshes and permissions management.

title: Infrastructure as Code
body: Using terraform to provision cloud resources, restrict ACLs and deploy infrastructure via pipelines.
